short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SSSPICY! is an arcade game to help the hungry snake eat all the spicy pepper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A hungry snake went looking for food, and stumbled upon a peculiar, spicy pepper. Help the snake eat all the food and get back to its home!

Play Online & Full screen

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Z to undo

R to restart

Esc to open the settings menu. You can skip any level from this menu.

Hold shift+T for a couple seconds to clear your save.

Works on mobile too!

Touch and drag to move

Undo and Restart buttons will show on screen
